st:Description.name: NCMfgResources
st:Description.st:role: Lists the settings of the resources used in the Machining applications
st:Description.st:detailedRole: The resources machining settings are useful to manages options on tools and ressources catalogs

st:attribute.Name: PPToolsLocation
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the directory where to find catalogs and files for tools and PP tables
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the directory where to find catalogs and files for tools and PP tables

st:attribute.Name: FeedAutoUpd
st:attribute.st:role: Automatic compute of feedrate attributes of the operation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Automatic compute of feedrates attributes of the operation

st:attribute.Name: SpindleAutoUpd
st:attribute.st:role: Automatic compute of spindle attributes of the operation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Automatic compute of spindle attributes of the operation

st:attribute.Name: NCMfgToolQueryInMachProcess
st:attribute.st:role: Tool Query mode in Machining Process instanciation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Tool Query mode in Machining Process instanciation

st:enum.st:role: Automatic Tool Query for Machining Process instanciation
Interactive Tool selection in case of multiple results forMachining Process instanciation

st:default.st:role: By default an Automatic Tool Query is done for Machining Process instanciation

st:attribute.Name: NCMfgNoToolInMachProcess
st:attribute.st:role: Interactive Tool selection if no tool is found
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Interactive Tool selection if no tool is found
